biotools.summary:
VCell (Virtual Cell) is a software for modeling and simulation of cell biological systems.  It is built on a central database and disseminated as a web application. It includes 
 deterministic (compartmental ODE or reaction-diffusion-advection PDE with support for 2D kinematics), stochastic (SSA solvers), spatial stochastic (reaction-diffusion with Smoldyn), hybrid deterministic/stochastic and network-free agent-based simulations. There is support for rule-based modeling (BioNetGen and NFSim), spatial features such as membrane flux, lateral membrane diffusion, electrophysiology, geometries from 2D or 3D microscope images or analytical expressions.

bioschemas.name: VCell
